706913f-a.text:
Stone Avenue, north from MacDougal Street to Broadway. The W. P. A. is conducting a sewer project here. On Broadway (background) is the eleva'ed of the B. M. T.
subway.
Hay 20, 1936
Works Progress Administration
Five Boroughs Project
